name: Tea Room Chicken Salad Sandwiches
author: Godiva Goddess
summary: I just had these at a tea room and they were so yummy!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ bunch fresh dill, finely chopped
½ small bunch fresh cilantro, chopped
¼ cup finely chopped fresh chives
1 whole roasted chicken, bones and skin removed, meat cut into cubes
12 slices white bread, crusts removed, or as needed
directions: Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, lemon zest, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until thoroughly combined
Add cucumber, dill, cilantro, chives, and almonds and combine
Add chicken and combine thoroughly with dressing
Create sandwiches with your bread; cut sandwiches into fourths
